Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class SoloGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.SoloGame
public class SoloGame extends Game
This class represents a single-player game of Masters of Renaissance. It contains all the extra functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoloGame

      public SoloGame​(Player player, List<DevCardColor> colors, List<ResourceType> resourceTypes, List<LeaderCard> leaderCards, List<DevelopmentCard> developmentCards, List<ResourceContainer> resContainers, List<ResourceTransactionRecipe> productions, List<ActionToken> actionTokens, DevCardGrid devCardGrid, Market market, FaithTrack faithTrack, int maxObtainableDevCards, int devSlotsCount)
      Initializes the solo game with the following parameters.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player who joined
      colors - the list of development card colors
      resourceTypes - the list of resource types
      leaderCards - the list of leader cards
      developmentCards - the list of development cards
      resContainers - the list of resource containers
      productions - the list of productions
      actionTokens - the deck of tokens, of which the top token is activated after each round
      devCardGrid - the development card grid
      market - the resource market
      faithTrack - the faith track
      maxObtainableDevCards - the number of development cards a player can have, before triggering the end of the
